          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Formation of crystals in saturated solution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anordnung der Kristalle in gesättigter Lösung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation des cristaux dans la solution saturée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação dos cristais na solução saturated</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione dei cristalli nella soluzione 
saturata</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός των κρυστάλλων στη διαποτισμένη λύση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación de cristales en la solución saturada</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that crystals of undissolved solute form in a hot saturated solution when it cools down.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">compounds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cooling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crystals</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">dissolution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">insolubility</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">liquids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mixing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">saturated solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solubility</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Kristalle des 
unaufgelösten aufgelösten Stoffs in einer heißen gesättigten 
Lösung sich bilden, wenn sie unten abkühlt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que les cristaux du 
corps dissous non dissous forment dans une solution saturée chaude 
quand elle refroidit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que os cristais de 
solute undissolved dão forma em uma solução saturated quente quando
esfria para baixo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che i cristalli di 
soluto non dissolto formano in una soluzione saturata calda quando si 
raffredda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι τα κρύσταλλα της 
undissolved διαλυτής ουσίας διαμορφώνουν σε μια καυτή 
διαποτισμένη λύση όταν δροσίζει κάτω.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que los cristales del 
solute sin disolver forman en una solución saturada caliente cuando 
se refresca abajo.</string>
          </description>
